title: Crater Lake National Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved                   Volunteer               Work With Us               Planning             NPS Centennial 2016 is the the 100th birthday of the National Park Service.  Find out what we are doing to get ready, and look for ways that you can help.       Volunteer Join us in preserving Crater Lake National Park for future generations.        Work With Us Are you interested in working with the National Park Service?  Here is how to make that happen.       Planning Park governing principals and documents.        Support Your Park  Groups, associations, volunteers, and everyday park visitors all have the potential to contribute in some way to the protection of our National Parks.
